art.post: Many years ago I had a vision of Christ. He was weeping over a possible loss of a soul. Satan was sneering at Christ. That person’ssoul was not lost after all. Jesusno longer wept.  The vision, which was huge in size, showed Christ to look almost exactly like this painting except for the tears werecopious amounts.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
